Class Raytracer.Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      • Raytracer.Scene
  • Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    class Raytracer.Scene
extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable
    Contains all the data necessary to render a scene.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Raytracer.Vector3 cameraOrigin
      The point at which all primary rays originate.
      float fov
      The camera field of view (in degrees).
      java.util.ArrayList<Raytracer.Light> lights
      A list of all the Lights in the scene.
      java.util.ArrayList<Raytracer.SceneObject> sceneObjects
      A list of all the SceneObjects in the scene.
      float shadowBias
      The shadow bias (see footnote on page 3 of design document).
      Raytracer.Vector3 skyColor
      The color that a pixel is set to if the primary ray did not hit anything.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Scene​()
      Default constructor, will return a hard-coded demo scene.
      Scene​(processing.data.JSONObject j)
      Constructs a Scene object from the values in the JSONObject (JSON deserialization).

      • toJSONObject

        public processing.data.JSONObject toJSONObject​()
        Description copied from class: Raytracer.JSONSerializable
        Serializes this object into a JSONObject. Stores the name of this class into the "type" entry of the JSONObject. Subclasses should override this method, call super.toJSONObject() to get a JSONObject, and then store all their necessary data into that.
        Overrides:
        toJSONObject in class Raytracer.JSONSerializable
        Returns:
        the JSONObject containing this object's data.

      • copy

        public Raytracer.Scene copy​()
        Deep copies this object. This is accomplished by serializing it to JSON then deserializing it again.
        Returns:
        a deep copy of this Scene object.
